configuration_states_circles.png.description: Three circular configuration diagrams showing initial and deformed states labeled with B⁰, B¹, and B^T with position vectors

heat_flux_direction_convention.png.description: Small sketch showing heat flux vector q with normal vector h and angle notation illustrating inward/outward direction convention

boundary_conditions_schematic.png.description: Schematic diagram showing boundary surfaces with labels S_U (imposed displacements), S_F (imposed forces), S_Q (heat flux boundary), and S_T (temperature boundary) with union and intersection notation
